column1: Stays and residents at women's shelters by ancestry, resident status,
duration and time
Total
Persons of Danish origin
Immigrants and descendants
Unknown origin
The statistics relate to stays at women's shelters according to §109
of the Social Service Act. All women's shelters have reported and
approved data in 2023. In the statistics for 2023, 4 pct. of the
women and 9 pct. of the children are either anonymous or without a
valid social security number. The number of children in the tables
are calculated as the sum of the given social security numbers of
children in the data. The variable "number of children" is
also found in micro data. Deviations between this variable and the
sum of the social security numbers of children can occur, for
example, due to input errors in the data that the women's shelters
report. Debugging is currently not done for this error type. Ancestry
is the mother's ancestry throughout the table, and the figures for
children therefore show the number of children with a mother of that
ancestry.
